solution_line_template: Elysse and her brother can carry {bags_per_trip_per_person} x {number_of_people} = <<{bags_per_trip_per_person}*{number_of_people}={bags_per_trip_total}>>{bags_per_trip_total} bags of groceries with each trip from the car.
Therefore, it will take both of them {total_bags}/{bags_per_trip_total} = <<{total_bags}/{bags_per_trip_total}={trips_needed}>>{trips_needed} trips.
